relation: Campus Safety is excellent. There is always someone around in each building.
The school has an activity for everyone.
I think the learning experience you get here is great for the price that they charge you.

The teachers/staff are awesome here at this college. They take the time to help you with your classes. The college environment is also more personal, the one on one time with the teachers to help you with your studies is priceless.
pageTitle: Howard Community College Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {77356=They have a theater performance from time to time. They have clubs and a game room. This up coming week on September 20, 2012 there will be a outdoor movie event. They are going to show Hunger Game. I can't wait for that!!!!!!, 31282=mostly people hang out in the quad cafe during lunchtime. but when it starts getting nice outside (from march to october), the quad area is filled with people who are playing ultimate frisbee, soccer, football, whatever you can think of, they're probably doing it at the quad. other than that, the columbia mall is less than five minutes away from the school, which contains a food court, many shopping and game centers, along with all sorts of commercial restaurants surrounding the it. also, there is a movie theater, so a great location for a relaxing movie-and-dinner date., 27710=yes, there are blue lights at hcc, but unfortunately, they are only found in the parking garages and a few spots in the parking lots (at least the one's i've seen). teachers stress on the very first day of class to get the instant updates on your cell phone. the school immediately sends you a message about all types of emergencies and late school openings or closings. it's a very handy tool, so you won't have to wake up extra early to see the 5 o'clock news to see if you have school or not., 177515=© 2015, Cappex.com, LLC}

textAfterTable: HCC is an amazing place to get your AA degree or your general education credits to transfer. There are so many classes and majors to choose from, the time really does fly by. Login to rate or flag the reviews Tano from Laurel, MD 01/31/2010 Reviewer is A current student here. 3 out of 3 people found this review useful. 2 of 45 Categories Comments Great for these types of students Transfer Students Further Education Students Continuing Education Tips for prospective students I would highly recommend attending Howard Community College because not only is it full of interesting people, but it also gives you an opportunity to choose your major at a far reduced price. Howard Community College is a very unique college because it combines the effectiveness of a liberal arts school, and specializes in nearly all majors.
